definition: a pause from doing something (as work), close at the end of a session
details:
noun
- a pause from doing something (as work)
= synonyms: break
- an enclosure that is set back or indented
= synonyms: niche
- an arm off of a larger body of water (often between rocky headlands)
= synonyms: inlet
- a small concavity
= synonyms: recession
- a state of abeyance or suspended business
= synonyms: deferral
verb
- close at the end of a session
= synonyms: break up, adjourn
- make a recess in
= example: make a recess in
- put into a recess
= example: put into a recess
